title: Drawing, "DragonOil (Black and White Mock-up with Overlay)", after 1980
medium: Photographic plastic film, blue and black ink, white adhesive paper tape, white tracing paper mounted to white wove paper
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Design for a logo. The word DRAGONOIL, reproduced on self adhesive photographic film, mounted at center of sheet. The word dragon in white; oil in gray dot-screen pattern. Blue ruled lines define borders; two black registration marks at each corner. Tracing paper overlay attached to wove mounting paper with white tape at top edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "DragonOil (Black and White Mock-up with Overlay)", after 1980.
after 1980. Photographic plastic film, blue and black ink, white adhesive paper tape, white tracing paper mounted to white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-385.
